Yes, very long ago anybody here wasn't. You want to learn in more detail about our action?
At us now, passes action L2Day. To take part and receive prizes, you need to kill monsters to beat out LETTERS and to collect from them one or the other words:
N C S O F T L I N E A G E II
Can beat everybody, but remember that for percent of drop-out of a thing plays a role level of your player and level of the killed monster. So test good luck!
